title: Latvian President: Road toll tax law needs review
summary_full: Following the adoption of amendments to the Road Use Tax Law in its final reading, several important issues remain that the legislator should reconsider, and therefore a second review of this law is necessary, said President Edgars Rinkēvičs in a post on social media on 9th December.
